website_summaries.verdict: 6 neodymium magnets are set at the wrist of this minimalist copper cuff. Stack with other bracelets for style or with multiple magnetic cuffs to increase effects.
pros: Offers relief and should not discolor skin
cons: Magnets only placed on the tips rather than the whole inside of the bracelet

customer_reviews.title: Farce
customer_reviews.text: How do I get in touch with the makers? I bought this product and within 3 days of me wearing it, it starts to turn green. The side starts stripping. The magnets have changed colour . How do I request a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Andre J.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used different magnetic bracelets in the past that worked great for getting rid of the stiffness in my fingers I often feel upon awakening. Unfortunately, I lost them (their magnetic quality caused them to stick to metal things and come off me without me realizing). This one was different in style so I thought it would prevent that from happening. It was rated Editor's Choice, so I ordered it. It was disappointing. It has done NOTHING to help with the pain/stiffness over the month or so where I wore it daily. Unfortunately, my return window has closed so I cannot return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing this for about a week. And even in that short of time I am noticing a difference in my lower back pain. I deliver appliances so I'm always in some aches and pains so far it really seems to be helping.
customer_reviews.author: evan b.

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: My father has had pain in his wrist for years and I gave this to him as a gift months ago. Despite not ever wearing jewelry of any kind he agreed to give it a try and he was amazed at how well it worked, he told me the pain went away after just a few days of wearing the bracelet 24 hours a day. I didn't hold much hope for this product but it does work. It also is pretty rugged, my father is a carpenter so this definitely takes a beating through the day and it hasn't shown any signs of weakening.
customer_reviews.author: DEAD2RITES

customer_reviews.title: I wear them most of the time and am pretty happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these at the suggestion of a friend. I wear them most of the time and am pretty happy with them. I only got a little frustrated because i have fairly small wrists and to get them down to the right size they got out of shape and I ended up spending quite a bit of time trying to get them fitted. Other than that they are quite nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kiowagus

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: My husband has minor aches and pains so I bought him one of these. It works. He wore it on his left arm but has some pains in his right arm so he switched the bracelet and the pain in his right arm eased away. I'm not saying it would make all pain go away but it worked for him. I recommend you give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: massey

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the bracelet. The first week I wore it didn't have to take pain pills. I twisted my arthritic knee and took pain pills for that. I have osteoarthritis and a bad back, Had several back procedures and was getting ready to get another procedure but canceled the appointment, I wear two bracelets 24-7 and am very happy with the results. I read that people have worn copper jewelry for the treatment of arthritis for a couple thousand years. Of course, one man's medicine can be another man's poison, so try it and pay attention to how you feel in a week or two. Mine worked the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Butts

customer_reviews.title: naturally relieves pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bracelet because of my brother is suffering a pain and he really need an alternative way to relieves it, thanks I have found this because he feel so great right now, and always telling me that this is really effective.
customer_reviews.author: David Murray

customer_reviews.title: Allergic reaction
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes of putting this bracelet on I developed redness, welts and a blister! I am not allergic to any metals or materials I've ever encountered. I was really excited about this because a friend recommended therapeutic magnets for pain relief. Never hurts to try something new, unless it's this product. Maybe mine was defective but my arm feels like it's on fire. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: beneficial
customer_reviews.text: Great bracelet and EVEN BETTER FOR MY ARTHRITIS. I can do thinks now that I couldn't do before. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: The two magnetic bracelet I have still in the bag ...
customer_reviews.text: The two magnetic bracelet I have still in the bag didn't work for me because I'm diabetic and I wear the insulin pump and instruction say do not use because it will do something to the pump so I couldn't use them but I know they do work because I have two sisters that got them from you I could sent them back I had no invoice and return label. Please this right. Thanks in adv
customer_reviews.author: sarah roby

customer_reviews.title: easy to shape
customer_reviews.text: easy to shape, it does get uncomfortable if you are resting your arm on a flat service. may be in the head but believe it helps with the joint pain in th elbow and wrist

customer_reviews.title: Great bracelet

customer_reviews.title: This is made from hardened and pressed copper and that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is made from hardened and pressed copper and that process negates the benefits of copper. And as others have noticed it is for very small wristsIf you are looking for decoration, look no further. If you need arthritis relief, actually any pain, this product will not meet your needs

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic copper bracelet relieves pain

I plan to look into more copper jewelry with magnets. This bracelet matches the ring I purchased...It's a great product, and I highly recommend to those who suffer from arthritis in the hands.

customer_reviews.title: Not adjustable

customer_reviews.title: Great bracelet!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my copper bracelet on a whim, because it looked nice and I've been curious about them. When I received it, I was impressed with the care that was taken in packaging it as well as by the heft and feel of the bracelet itself. It is very beautiful, and the magnets cannot be seen once you put it on. I wrapped it around my wrist and haven't taken it off since. It's been 3 days! I barely notice it, even showered in it, but when I do see it, it still looks great! I have a little problem with minor carpal tunnel pain, so maybe that will improve over time as well. What a nice surprise!

Unfortunately, about an inch of the inner band turned green and a black outlining on the little discs also on the inside of the bracelet. There was no reaction on her skin which was good but why the bracelet is changing colors right away I don't know. I suggested she wear the bracelet in her pocket, in case there will be some positive effect because it's still on the body. I will try again with another bracelet....

product_meta.title: The Original Minimalist Pure Copper Magnetic Healing Bracelet for Arthritis, Carpal Tunnel, and Joint Pain Relief – Adjustable - For Men and Women - Earth Therapy
product_meta.description: Simple Minimalist High Quality Copper Magnetic Bracelet This bracelet is perfect for anyone looking to help relieve pain from arthritis, RSI, carpal tunnel, migraines, fatigue and more. Whether you live a calm and relaxing life or a very active lifestyle, many people find copper bracelets help reduce some of their aches and pains as they grow older. The minimalist style design is perfect for blending in with the rest of your accessories. Why Magnets & Copper? Magnets worn close to your joints are believed to help increase blood flow to these joints, bringing healing nutrients such as iron and vitamin C to them. Magnets have been used in traditional Chinese medicine for thousands of years and are still used today as a first line treatment for many common complaints. And the believed health benefits of copper include proper growth of the body, efficient utilization of iron, proper enzymatic reactions, as well as improved health of connective tissues, hair, and eyes. Bring natural pain relief to your life today - order your pure copper magnetic therapy bracelet now!
feature_bullets: ONE SIZE FITS MOST WRISTS - Bracelet sizes at an adjustable 6.5 inches in diameter. Its sleek design matches any fashion style, and is perfect for both men and women.

NATURAL PAIN MANAGEMENT - Magnetic therapy is a natural supplement to invasive OTC pills. Our pure copper bracelets are a great treatment for pain relief associated with arthritis, joint pain, carpal tunnel, migraine, and fatigue.
RARE EARTH MAGNETS - Contains 6 authentic, high-quality, rare earth magnets delivering over 15,000 Gauss to fight pain and inflamation. We source only the finest grade magnetic alloys.
HIGH QUALITY AND ELEGANT DESIGN - This classic minimalist jewelry will grab many compliments. Each bracelet comes in a luxurious velvet pouch, making it a perfect gift.
